sentences.sContent: All striated wires are minus (–) in polarity, and should be connected to the minus (–) speaker terminals.
sentences.sContent_eng: All striated wires are minus (–) in polarity, and should be connected to the minus (–) speaker terminals.
sentences.sCn: 所有具有条纹线皮的电线都是负（-）极，须连接到负（-）的扬声器端子。

trans.tranCn: 有条纹的, 有细条的, 有线纹的
trans.tranOther: having narrow lines or bands of colour
